title: I'm back... Again...
body:
So I've been suckered into playing league again and, honestly, I've just given up trying to quit. I'm done trying to kid myself, I'll be playing this smegging game until Riot goes bankrupt. I'm going to (*try to*) take on a whole new mentality and just restrain myself from complaining. Feel free to take the piss if I stray (and if I [or Riot] say you shouldn't, just quote this because this is basically me giving you permission).

On another note, I'm seeing a lot of new names on the boards. Are these new people or just the result of name-changes?

Also, what have I missed? Did the illegal immigrants finally get deported?
